Package chess

Class Board

java.lang.Object
chess.Board
public class Board extends Object
Board houses the internal data structures of the game.

The board has the very important job of finalizing piece movement and detecting GameExceptions.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Creates a new board. Puts all chess pieces onto the board into the relevant cells.

  • Method Details

    • init

      private void init()
      Initializes the chess board with all the needed piece to play

    • initNewPiece

      private void initNewPiece​(ChessPiece piece, int row, int col)
      Initializes a new piece into the game. Puts into onto the board and adds it to the list of currently active pieces.
      Parameters:
      piece - The Chess piece to add to the game
      row - The row in which we are to place the piece
      col - The column in which we are to place the piece

    • tryMove

      public GameException tryMove​(String[] inputs, Color playerColor)
      Attempts to do the requested move from the player
      Parameters:
      inputs - The current player's input
      playerColor - The color of whoever's turn it is
      Returns:
      A notification of if the move was successful

    • enemyInCheckMate

      private boolean enemyInCheckMate​(Color enemyColor)
      Checks if the enemy is currently in checkmate.
      Parameters:
      enemyColor - The color of the enemy
      Returns:
      Whether the enemy in in checkmate

    • handleSpecialMoveCase

      private ChessPiece handleSpecialMoveCase​(ChessPiece requestedPiece, Board.Cell[] endPoints, String[] input)
      Handles special movement cases for chess pieces.

      Special movements include: EnPassant, Pawn Promotion, and Castling

      Parameters:
      requestedPiece - The piece that is requesting to move
      endPoints - The set of cells that denote the start and end of the move
      input - User input from the requested move
      Returns:
      Any OTHER chess piece that was affected by the requested piece to move

    • isSpecialMove

      private boolean isSpecialMove​(ChessPiece requestedPiece, Board.Cell start, Board.Cell dest)
      Determines if the move requested will result in a special move and must be handled differently.
      Parameters:
      requestedPiece - The piece that is requesting to move
      start - The starting cell of the move
      dest - The destination cell of the move
      Returns:
      Whether the requested move must be handled as a special case

    • doMove

      private ChessPiece doMove​(Board.Cell start, Board.Cell dest)
      Actually executes the movement of the piece from one cell to another
      Parameters:
      start - The starting cell of the move
      dest - The destination cell of the move
      Returns:
      A chess piece that was "taken" by the move. If no piece taken, null.

    • undoMove

      private void undoMove​(Board.Cell start, Board.Cell dest, ChessPiece old, boolean special)
      Undoes a move that was executed by doMove()
      Parameters:
      start - The starting cell of the movement
      dest - The ending cell of the movement
      old - The old ChessPiece that was manipulated by the called upon piece
      special - Denotes if this movement was a special move

    • killPiece

      private void killPiece​(ChessPiece taken)
      Removes a piece from the set of currently active pieces on the board
      Parameters:
      taken - The piece that was taken off the board

    • movePutsEnemyInCheck

      private boolean movePutsEnemyInCheck​(Color playerColor)
      Determines if a move put the enemy into check
      Parameters:
      playerColor - The color of the player that is doing the move
      Returns:
      Whether the enemy in now in check

    • movePutsSelfInCheck

      private boolean movePutsSelfInCheck​(Color playerColor)
      Determines if a player's move puts themselves into check
      Parameters:
      playerColor - The color of the player that is doing the move
      Returns:
      Whether the player is now in check

    • kingColorLocation

      private Board.Cell kingColorLocation​(Color colorToFind)
      Locates the cell that a king is located within
      Parameters:
      colorToFind - The color of the King
      Returns:
      The cell in which the king is located

    • isKingAttackedByColor

      private boolean isKingAttackedByColor​(Board.Cell kingLocation, Color attacker)
      Determines if a king is currently being attacked by an enemy teams pieces
      Parameters:
      kingLocation - The cell that the king is currently in
      attacker - The color of the attacking team
      Returns:
      Whether the king is being attacked

    • calculateAllMoves

      private void calculateAllMoves()
      Recalculates all possible moves for every active piece on the board

    • setCell

      public void setCell​(int row, int col, ChessPiece p)
      Sets a cell to contain a chess piece
      Parameters:
      row - The row/rank the cell is in
      col - The column/file the cell is in
      p - The piece to place into the cell

    • getCell

      public Board.Cell getCell​(int row, int col)
      Fetches a cell from the board
      Parameters:
      row - The row/rank the cell is in
      col - The column/file the cell is in
      Returns:
      The requested cell on the board

    • getTotalMoves

      public int getTotalMoves()
      Gets the current total amount of successful moves within the game
      Returns:
      The number of successful moves so far

    • mapToBoard

      private Board.Cell[] mapToBoard​(String[] inputs)
      Maps a set of inputs to two cells on the board
      Parameters:
      inputs - The input from the user
      Returns:
      Two cells mapped from inputs
